name: StoMech
description:
< Click the question mark in the upper-right corner for an in-game tutorial! >

StoMech is a local multiplayer game, where one of you controls a robot and the 2nd player manages its body.

The game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 5 by Áron Andics, Bendegúz Szkalka and Vince Döme Bartha. Special thanks to Shan Jia Hao, who translated it to Chinese. We are looking forward to further updating this project.

If you are interested, here are some more detailed explanations of the game mechanics:
